title: Star Guaridan Icon
body: Okay so I've taken the quiz to get to the "claim icon" screen. However, when I get my result at the end of the quiz there is no "claim icon" button. Is it too late to redeem the icon or is it a glitch? Thanks!

replies.body:
[Grab a screenshot](https://gyazo.com/) and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see what we can do. ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions.
